data.message: im living in a curse fuckin darkness im poor depressed living zombie dead without hopes there destroying our dreams no help from nobody I have no home my parents dumped me there separated im alone but in my soul im tough and strong and love eminem he's music is a miracle to me he and me and all Stans are my only truly shadyfamily please eminem come to Greece I want badly my whole life to mEet u and see u live. please
